title: Calories in Coors Banquet
meta_description: Discover calories in Coors Banquet beer per 12 oz serving, including carbs, protein, sodium, and quick tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Standard 12 fl oz serving of Coors Banquet Original lager beer, 5% ABV, no additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by batch, serving size, and temperature; check labels or official sources for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One 12 oz serving of Coors Banquet provides 153 kcal, mainly from 12.8 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one Coors Banquet?
What are the carbs in Coors Banquet?
faqs.a: 12.8 g of carbohydrates per 12 oz serving, with 0 g fiber or sugars.

faqs.q: Does Coors Banquet have protein or fat?
faqs.a: 1.2 g protein and 0 g fat per serving.

faqs.q: How much sodium in Coors Banquet beer?
Calories in Coors Banquet vs. other beers?
faqs.a: Coors Banquet has 153 kcal per 12 oz; lighter options like Coors Light have fewer, around 102 kcal.
